Class Book

java.lang.Object
backend.model.Media
backend.model.Book
public class Book extends Media
Represents a Book entity that extends the Media class.

A Book can be borrowed and returned by a user, and a fine can be calculated if it is returned after its due date. The fine calculation is delegated to a BookFineStrategy.

Default borrowing period is 28 days.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Hiba_ibraheem

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, String isbn)
      Constructs a new Book object with the specified title, author, and ISBN. Automatically assigns a BookFineStrategy for fine calculation.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book
      author - the author of the book
      isbn - the ISBN identifier for the book

  • Method Details

    • borrow

      public void borrow(String username)
      Marks the book as borrowed by a specific user.

      The due date is set to 28 days from the current date.

      Specified by:
      borrow in class Media
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the borrower

    • returned

      public void returned()
      Marks the book as returned.

      Resets borrowing status, borrower username, and due date.

      Specified by:
      returned in class Media

    • isOverdue

      public boolean isOverdue()
      Checks whether the book is overdue.
      Specified by:
      isOverdue in class Media
      Returns:
      true if the book is borrowed and the current date is after the due date; false otherwise

    • calculateFine

      public double calculateFine()
      Calculates the fine for the book if it is overdue.

      The fine amount is determined based on the number of overdue days using the BookFineStrategy.

      Specified by:
      calculateFine in class Media
      Returns:
      the fine amount; returns 0.0 if the book is not overdue
